titleStmt.title: A new spring of divine poetrie. I. Day. philomusus composuit - inest sua gratia parvis
titleStmt.author: Day, James, fl. 1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T[homas] C[otes] for Humphry Blunden, at his shop neere the Castle Taverne, in Corne-hill,

notesStmt.note: With an interpolated, unpaginated gathering signed (F) following quire F. Variant: lacking quire (F) ("may represent an early issue"--STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
